plot: A young man in love with his uncle's ward can't convince his uncle that he's fit to marry her, and schemes to continue seeing her anyway. The uncle, however, is determined to see that his nephew gets nowhere near the girl.
title: Too Many Husbands
plot_es: A young man in love with his uncle's ward can't convince his uncle that he's fit to marry her, and schemes to continue seeing her anyway. The uncle, however, is determined to see that his nephew gets nowhere near the girl.
plot_en: A young man in love with his uncle's ward can't convince his uncle that he's fit to marry her, and schemes to continue seeing her anyway. The uncle, however, is determined to see that his nephew gets nowhere near the girl.
